duties_responsibilities.duty: Demonstrate Skybeck’s Core Values – WE ARE by providing preconstruction services such as estimating, subcontractor review and selection, scope review, and contract writing.
Manage document processing including RFI’s, Submittals, Meeting Minutes, and Schedules. Maintain electronic files for use in PlanGrid.
Troubleshoot design discrepancies and assist in ordering materials and scheduling deliveries.
Coordinate with subcontractors, review subcontractor draw requests, and help prepare monthly pay applications.
Support the Superintendent and Project Manager with their overall job responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Construction Engineering or related field. 2-5 years’ experience in the construction industry (preferably Commercial, Multi-family, or Hospitality)
